channel.title: Sections Questions
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I'm new to the community of MoparScape, and I'm new at coding Runescape Private Servers too. I've already made some servers, but all of them was bad, well, most of the players that played it, quitted since it wasn't good... So, I would like to ask to this community, what's the section that allows the members request for Sources Downloads, if it does exist here. :cool: I was about to request for Sources at the 'Server Downloads' section, but I wasn't sure if it's right or not... I don't want to break any rules here.
Thanks, [i]Jack-[/i]

item.title: Sections Questions
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

B2300 T4nk:

I will respect you from now Jack.

agreed. me to.

Read full topic

item.title: Sections Questions
item.dc:creator: @Jack3 Jack-
item.description:
@Jack3 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:2, topic:331096”]Holy shit, a new age where people actually question where to post things since there isn’t a place for what you want! CONGRATULATIONS! You’re the first to do it in history!!!

Anyway, there really isn’t a board to do so. The only place that would have a slight relevance is the Server Help board but even there it’s not exactly allowed.[/quote]
Haha, I don’t like breaking rules, and I am also new to the RSPS community.

Oh by the way, thanks mate, I will be searching for sources at the ‘Server Downloads’ section, and I will also check the section you mentioned.

Thanks for being cool.
Jack-

Read full topic
